Description: Spacious North End 3 bedroom apartment. Very close to North Station/TD Garden. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Hardwood flooring through out the apartment. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Virtual tour is available. Laundry in the building. 1 months broker fee. Call now!
